name: full-restore
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Restores HP to full and cures any status ailment and confusion.
short_effect: Restores HP to full and cures any status ailment and confusion.

flavor_text.black_white: A medicine that fully restores the HP and heals any status problems of a single Pokémon.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: A medicine that fully restores the HP and heals any status problems of a single Pokémon.
